--- title: PDE keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This module contains the PDE class with the basic functionality to solve PDEs with NNs." ---

class PDE[source]

PDE(inputs, outputs, params=None)

PDE class with basic functionality to solve PDEs with NNs

Instantiate a PDE.

pde = PDE(inputs=['x', 't'], outputs=['p'], params=['u'])

Get a summary of the PDE inputs, outputs, params and bocos.

pde.summary()

inputs (train):  {'x': [], 't': []}
inputs (val):  {'x': [], 't': []}
outputs:  {'p': []}
params:  {'u': []}
bocos:  []
